title: Centralised accessibility hub
notes: Make hun appear as an Icon/clear word

title: UI customisation
notes: Allow UI to be customised and make sure that this doesn't impact functionality

title: Keyboard navigation
notes: Allow app to be fully function via keyboard alone

title: High contrast/bold text
notes: Allow the ability to enable high contrast/bold text to help users read content

title: Multiple stimuli
need: Provide additional ways for users to recieve information
notes: Makes the user less likely to forget about important events

title: Adjustable timing
need: Give users a chance to react to events
notes: Allow the user to manually dismiss events,or make events dismiss after accessibility tool is done

title: Time-outs
need: Notifies user when time-out will occur
notes: Will notify the users with enough time, minutes before time-out occurs

title: Prioritisation
notes: Allows the user to separate important tasks

id: ✅ At least 8 backlog items (mix of research + WCAG audit)
✅ Severity and inclusion risk assigned to each
✅ Evidence column links to notes or WCAG reference
